page.title: 15CROOKED BILLET
page.content: { { The Crooked Billet }is an area of grassland, ssurrounded by two pubs and houses. The Crooked Billet was given to the people by Oliver Cromwell's nephew,Thomas Cromwell. It was called 'Cromwell's Half Acre'. Part of the pub, the 'Crooked Billet', used to be a blacksmith's shop. {Cannizaro Park}was opened to the public on April 2nd 1949. The park contains many trees, shrubs and flowers. Cannizaro House is situated in the park;it is now uninhabited and is not open to the public. Henry Dundas,Viscount Melville, lived in the house from 1742-1811.The house has been brought and is being turned into an hotel.
